meanings.definition: A person who defeats an enemy or opponent in a battle or conflict.
meanings.sent1: The brave vanquisher led his team to victory in the battle.
meanings.sent2: The vanquisher emerged triumphant after defeating the enemy army.
meanings.sent3: The vanquisher's victory dance was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: She was a true vanquisher, conquering all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The vanquisher's name echoed through the land as a hero.

meanings.sent1: He managed to vanquisher all doubts with his convincing argument.
meanings.sent2: The hero vanquisher the evil sorcerer with a powerful spell.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret recipe vanquisher the competition at the cooking contest.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight vanquisher the darkness of the night sky.
meanings.sent5: Her determination vanquisher any obstacles in her way.
